snippet: With only 20 people in the Accident Investigation Squad of the New York Police, few fatalities result in charges against the driver.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column notes that understaffing at the New York City Police Dept's Accident Investigation Squad means that few hit-and-run accidents result in charges against drivers.
lead_paragraph: With only 20 people in the Accident Investigation Squad of the New York Police, few fatalities result in charges against the driver.

headline.seo: Reckless Drivers Who Hit People Face Few Penalties in New York
headline.main: Reckless Drivers Who Hit People Face Few Penalties in New York
headline.print_headline: Reckless Drivers Who Hit People Face Few Penalties in New York
